name: Sven Pedersen
title: Experienced Software Engineer
summary: Dynamic and result-driven Software Leader with extensive experience in developing robust software solutions across various industries and cloud-based technologies. Excel in orchestrating construction and maintenance of complex microservices and geospatial databases to optimize performance and reliability. Adept at leveraging tools to empower teams and enhance system security and deployment efficiency. Passion for data engineering and proven track record of driving improvements that enable teammates to excel and projects to succeed.

experience.summary: Designed complex software systems for airspace management using Python, Go, and JavaScript/TypeScript. Architected scalable microservices to handle high-volume data processing. Optimized cloud-based infrastructure on GCP/Azure for improved performance and reliability. Developed geospatial database systems using PostgreSQL/PostGIS for efficient data retrieval and analysis. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define software solutions. Wrote DevOps platform code using Kubernetes, Terraform, and cloud services in a secure environment.
highlights: Ensured high reliability under load for airspace-authorization microservices.
Optimized config-driven ETL pipeline using simple cloud services.
Enabled less experienced developers to easily and safely deploy apps through DevOps platform code.
Improved configuration-driven geospatial database system for map tiles and airspace authorization services.
Reduced system downtime through implementation of robust error handling and recovery mechanisms.

experience.summary: Developed advanced airspace authorization systems for drone operations using Python and JavaScript. Integrated complex geospatial data into user-friendly interfaces using PostgreSQL. Created sophisticated simulation models for air traffic safety analysis. Implemented secure APIs for data exchange with external systems. Optimized algorithms for real-time airspace monitoring and management using SQL and Redis. Deployed solutions on Google Cloud Platform using Docker and Ansible.
highlights: Implemented airspace authorization system for FAA LAANC program.
Provided mapping and safety boundaries for drone pilots by ingesting geospatial data.
Modeled air traffic safety measures through simulation and analytics systems.
Increased system accuracy through advanced algorithm optimization.
Streamlined development process, resulting in faster time-to-market.

experience.summary: Architected scalable data pipelines for music content processing using Python and AWS services. Refactored mobile applications to enhance user experience using Objective C and React. Developed firmware for embedded systems in musical instruments using ANSI C. Implemented pattern recognition for music data. Optimized backend systems using Python on AWS SNS and Lambda.
highlights: Created fully scalable distributed system for music lyric/chord data pipeline.
Improved UI/UX behavior in mobile app and prototyped app in React Native.
Implemented metadata enrichment, pattern matching, and cleanup of crowdsourced & curated content.
Developed firmware in C for STM32 ARM embedded MCU.
Reduced app crash rate through comprehensive error handling.
Increased user engagement with new interactive features.

experience.summary: Developed predictive analytics models for solar project management using Ruby on Rails. Created complex data visualizations for financial reporting with Highcharts/Highmaps. Optimized database queries for improved system performance in PostgreSQL. Implemented secure user authentication and authorization systems. Integrated third-party APIs for comprehensive data analysis. Practiced pair programming for code quality improvement.
highlights: Improved core prediction calculations performance by 10x+ in web-based software platform for solar project financial life-cycle management.
Implemented complex visualizations using Highcharts/Highmaps for solar asset valuation & reporting.
Increased data processing speed through query optimization.
Reduced report generation time with new caching mechanisms.
